definition: lit. face thirst and dig a well (idiom); fig. not to make adequate provision/to act when it is too late
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread
Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing
